snippet.title: Secret Spaces Trailer
snippet.description:
Secret Spaces is a procedural exploration/gardening game about descending deeper and deeper into the crawlspaces of an infinite building. Find and grow mysterious glowing plants to aid you on your journey -- climb on vines, ride on floating seeds, search for rare fruits. The Infinite Tower beckons below you... Will you answer its call?

Playable now and updated most weeks at: heather.flowers/secret-spaces
